snippet: The Schimmel Center for the Arts at Pace University in lower Manhattan will feature a new opera recital series starting this fall, the center said as it released its schedule of events for the upcoming season.
abstract: The Schimmel Center for the Arts at Pace University in lower Manhattan will feature a new opera recital series starting this fall, the center said as it released its schedule of events for the upcoming season.

headline.main: Pace Arts Center's Upcoming Season Will Feature New Opera Series
headline.print_headline: Schimmel Arts Center To Offer Opera Recitals
